title: Mindhunter
description: Set in the late 1970s – early 1980s, two FBI agents expand criminal science by delving into the psychology of murder and getting uneasily close to all-too-real monsters.

title: You
info: +18 · 2018–present · Crime, Drama, Thriller · 42 minutes per episode
description: A bookstore manager is more than willing to use his cunning and intellect to help the woman he loves — even if it means murder.

title: Bodyguard
info: +18 · 2018 · Action, Drama, Thriller · 60 minutes per episode
description: A troubled war veteran is assigned to protect a controversial politician who may be the target of a terrorist plot.

title: Ozark
info: +18 · 2017–2022 · Crime, Drama, Thriller · 60 minutes per episode
description: A financial planner relocates his family to the Ozarks after a money-laundering scheme goes wrong, forcing them into a life of crime.

title: Severance
info: +18 · 2022 · Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi · 60 minutes per episode
description: Mark leads a team at Lumon Industries where employees' memories are surgically divided between their work and personal lives, forcing them into a peculiar existence.
